function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low volume of collaboration in innovation platforms and networks","Impact":"Inefficiency in improving public services, lack of effective public decision-making, and limited public value creation","Mitigation":"Promote and incentivize collaboration, establish clear goals and objectives, and provide training on collaborative methods","Technologies":"Collaboration tools, project management software, and communication platforms","People":"Public administrations and stakeholders","Owner":"Public administration and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Inefficient strategic planning processes","Impact":"Lack of alignment and coordination, poor organizational performance, and failure to achieve common objectives","Mitigation":"Implement systematic, strategic foresight, establish robust governance mechanisms, and provide alignment support","Technologies":"Strategic planning software, governance tools, and performance management systems","People":"City governments, internal departments, and other levels of administrations","Owner":"City governments and administrations"}]}
